interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Summer's Eve Spa Set for Women | Gift Box | Women's Post Shave Hydrating Serum, 1oz Tube | Cleansing Feminine Wash, 12oz Bottle Review Date: 2022/09/06 Store: Summer's Eve Product Description: ["Give a special someone or pamper yourself and experience Daily Intimate Beauty with the Summer's Eve Spa gift set containing a Luxurious Cleansing Wash and an Intimate Serum. The Summer's Eve Spa Luxurious Cleansing Wash has a calming chamomile fragrance blended with essential oils. The creamy, pearly feminine wash is hypoallergenic and gynecologist tested, safe and gentle enough to use every day. Free from dyes and parabens, the wash cleanses and leaves the skin feeling pampered. Indulge in relaxation and renewal every day. The Summer's Eve Spa after shave Skin Serum was created for your most delicate intimate areas to comfortably hydrate, smooth and soften. Specifically designed to soothe delicate, freshly shaven or waxed intimate skin. 9 out of 10 women say the serum soothed skin after shaving. The serum is infused with vitamin E, coconut oil and aloe. Elevate your intimate care routine with the cleansing wash and luxurious serum from our Summer’s Eve Spa Kit for Women Gift Set."] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Scent': 'Spa', 'Brand': "Summer's Eve", 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Active Ingredients': 'Lactic_acid', 'Product Dimensions': '8.87 x 2.22 x 9.32 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '041608002324', 'Manufacturer': 'Prestige Consumer Healthcare', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Review Text: I’ve been using Summer’s Eve Feminine Products for years. They have never caused me any irritation and always kept me feeling clean and refreshed. With this being a new product of theirs, of course I needed to try it right away.
Minimal scent with the Wash and Fragrance FREE for the serum. I use the wash I as I always have with the other Summer’s Eve I have. I like that this is PH-Balanced. I use the serum on my bikini area after I’ve 🪒 shaved.

I have nothing but positive things to say about all Summer’s Eve products. I think all woman should care for their intimate areas carefully and these products are the best for that. Review Title: I have ALWAYS used Summer’s Eve⭐️👍 Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Everyday Beauty Glow Day Cream, Gel-to-Oil Rich Moisturizer to Minimize Signs of Aging, Reduce Redness, Dullness, and Fatigue for a Healthy Glow, 1 oz. Jar Everyday Beauty {'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.52 x 1.93 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '700463002381', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmetic Solutions, LLC'} I really like the feel of gel moisturizers when they go onto my face. There’s something about them that is super absorbent, yet extremely moisturizing. This particular cream/gel is exactly the same way. Did not leave a sticky/greasy feel/look at all on my face, it actually absorbed very quickly. It has a slight fragrant smell, nothing too extreme and it is did not irritate my skin at all. I have very sensitive skin and have to be careful about which products I use. It’s kept my face completely moisturized & glowing throughout the day.
My ONLY Issue with this product is the price. It’s a bit much for something that I need to use twice daily.
DISCLAIMER:
📝Yes, I am a VINE 🗣VOICE member. EVERY product that I review was selected by ME & ONLY ME. The product or item is ALWAYS something that is needed and will be used in my Home🏡 & Yard 🌱🍃, or for my FAMILY 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦& Pets🦮🐾🐈‍⬛, or JUST FOR ME 💁🏻‍♀️. It’s more of a GEL moisturizer than a CREAM👍⭐️ seedling Heated Eye Mask for Dry Eyes, Eye Compress Moist Heat, Silk sleep mask for dry eye relief, Plant Extract Warm Compress for Eyes, Stye Eye Therapy Mask (Blue) Seedling {'Brand': 'Seedling', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'M', 'Manufacturer': 'seedling', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} I have trouble every so often with my tear ducts clogging. If you’ve ever had them clogged before than you know the discomfort that comes with it. I’ve actually had a tube put in my right tear duct to clear a blockage and that is dreadful to go through. It has been recommended that I use warm/hot (not scolding) compress to help keep my tear ducts draining. I’m trying this mask to save time. It’s easier than standing at the sink and constantly warming up a wash cloths with the faucet. It’s definitely relaxing and I can feel how it is going to help me. I wear eye mask when I sleep so I’m already used to having a cover over my eyes. Recommended to prevent my tear ducts clogging again👍⭐️ Summer's Eve Spa Set for Women | Gift Box | Women's Post Shave Hydrating Serum, 1oz Tube | Cleansing Feminine Wash, 12oz Bottle Summer's Eve ["Give a special someone or pamper yourself and experience Daily Intimate Beauty with the Summer's Eve Spa gift set containing a Luxurious Cleansing Wash and an Intimate Serum. Specifically designed to soothe delicate, freshly shaven or waxed intimate skin. 9 out of 10 women say the serum soothed skin after shaving. The serum is infused with vitamin E, coconut oil and aloe. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Focus on gel-based moisturizers for facial skincare, with an expanded interest in intimate care products that prioritize comfort and hydration.
- **Skin Type Sensitivity:** Prioritizes products for sensitive skin, ensuring they are non-irritating and safe for daily use.
- **Aesthetic Feel:** Enjoys non-greasy, quick-absorbing formulas that maintain hydration and a healthy glow, extending this preference to soothing intimate care solutions.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Prefers mild or fragrance-free options to avoid overpowering scents.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Values affordable products for regular use while willing to invest in effective solutions for specific needs.
- **Engagement with Products:** Actively participates in reviews as a VINE member, sharing insights on skincare and health-related products for herself and her family, demonstrating a commitment to quality.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Generally enjoys product performance, with a tendency to provide constructive feedback regarding cost relative to frequent use.
- **Value for Quality:** Values the effectiveness and user experience over mere affordability, especially in products delivering immediate relief and long-term benefits.

This profile reflects a discerning consumer who not only prioritizes quality skincare but also recognizes the importance of intimate care and hygiene, embodying a holistic approach to her personal care regimen.
